params.description: The usernames of the users to get info about.

params.name: excludeBannedUsers?
params.description: Dictates if info about banned users should be excluded from the returned data. (defaults to false).

userIdsToUsersInfo.description: Gets information about multiple users from their ids.

tags.example: const { data: usersInfo } = await ClassicUsersApi.userIdsToUsersInfo({ userIds: [45348281] });

params.name: userIds
params.description: The ids of the users to get info about.

params.name: excludeBannedUsers?
params.description: Dictates if info about banned users should be excluded from the returned data. (defaults to false).

tags.example: const { data: previousUsernames } = await ClassicUsersApi.usernameHistory({ userId: 45348281 });
tags.exampleData: ["NamelessGuy2005", "parrrty"]

params.name: userId
params.description: The id of the user to get the username history for.

params.name: limit?
params.description: The number of results to be returned.

params.name: sortOrder?
params.description: The order that the results are sorted in.

params.name: cursor?
params.description: The paging cursor for the previous or next page.

tags.example: const { data: searchResults } = await ClassicUsersApi.userSearch({ keyword: "MightyPart", limit: 10 });
